*div1 type="summary"* *p*Henry Austin to Austin, November 15, 1831, Gen. John T. Mason and the Hawkins estate. Mrs. Hoiley's plans to settle in Texas.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*Bolivar */location_mentioned**date_mentioned n="11-15-1831">15. Novr 1831*/date_mentioned**/p* *p*My dear Sir*/p*
*p*My last advices of *person_mentioned*Mr Mason*/person_mentioned* left him at *location_mentioned*Louisvill */location_mentioned*waiting for the sickly season to pass away—*person_mentioned* Mrs. Holley*/person_mentioned* now informs me that he had taken passage in the Spica, giving out that he was coming here to settle the*person_mentioned* Hawkins*/person_mentioned* business with you After embarking, a letter was shown him from *person_mentioned*young Hawkins*/person_mentioned* stating that you were packing up for *location_mentioned*Mexico*/location_mentioned*—*person_mentioned*Mrs. H */person_mentioned*told him she had letters from you and myself both stating the time of your departure to be *date_mentioned n="12-01-1831">1 December*/date_mentioned*, He thought *person_mentioned*Hawkins */person_mentioned*account to be more to be relied upon and as his sole business in *location_mentioned*Texas */location_mentioned*was to see you, wisely left the Spica and embarked for *location_mentioned*Vera Cruz*/location_mentioned* to meet you in *location_mentioned*Mexico */location_mentioned*He is not the *person_mentioned*Mason */person_mentioned*who was in *location_mentioned*Mexico */location_mentioned*with *person_mentioned*Poinset */person_mentioned*never was in *location_mentioned*Mexico*/location_mentioned* and does not speak Spanish, so you can judge of the probable result of his mission at all events the affair is hung up as relates to us for the present—*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Mrs Holleys friends*/person_mentioned* would not consent to her leaving them until spring— her purpose therefore is to return and compleat her engagement and as she loses 100$ pr month during her absence is impatient to return yet is unwilling to do so without visiting *location_mentioned*St. Filipe*/location_mentioned* and seeing you— She is now here and I would hazard the journey with her on horseback but for the expectation of the immediate arrival of My *person_mentioned*Family*/person_mentioned*— They left*location_mentioned* N York*/location_mentioned* in the Nelson to sail *date_mentioned n="10-20-1831">20th of last month*/date_mentioned*, I shall go to *location_mentioned*Brazoria */location_mentioned*tomorrow and will endeavour to induce *person_mentioned*John */person_mentioned*to take her and his *person_mentioned*wife */person_mentioned*in *person_mentioned*Walter*/person_mentioned*s Carriage as he proposed when I was last there, if that fails I will try to get *person_mentioned*Mr Perry */person_mentioned*who I expect here *date_mentioned n="11-16-1831">tomorrow */date_mentioned*to let me have his Carriage for the purpose— She has brought money to build her *location_mentioned*house */location_mentioned*and stock her farm 900$ and appears decided to vest all her interests in the *location_mentioned*colony*/location_mentioned*, I shall however vest her funds in cows and calves for the present If you think it propper to admit her location and give her a passport of absence to settle her affairs. She will without doubt return in time and occupy her *location_mentioned*land */location_mentioned*altho some what alarmed at the occupations of *person_mentioned*Phelps*/person_mentioned* place, fearing She might be served the same way if detained by sickness of her *person_mentioned*children */person_mentioned*or other insuperable cause— she wrote you from *location_mentioned*Brazoria*/location_mentioned*, but does not expect an answer whilst you continue feeble—I am glad to hear you are able to walk about the room and hope you may be speedily restord I shall come to *location_mentioned*St Felepe*/location_mentioned* so soon as my *person_mentioned*family */person_mentioned*are housed—*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Archebald */person_mentioned*appears decided to come out so soon as he can realise his real Estate which ought to yield 2 or 3000$—with that I am [sure] he could do better here than there*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*H Austin*/person_mentioned* [Rubric]*/p*
*p**p*[Addressed:] *person_mentioned*Col. S F Austin*/person_mentioned* *location_mentioned*St Felepe d Austin*/location_mentioned* pr *person_mentioned*Dr A E Phelps*/person_mentioned**/p**/p*
*/div1*
